abstract: Google Calendar can warn you if it might rain on that parade this weekend.
snippet: Google Calendar can warn you if it might rain on that parade this weekend.
lead_paragraph: Google Calendar can warn you if it might rain on that parade this weekend. The Calendar displays small weather icons in the squares for the current day and the next two. Click on the icon on a day to see the current conditions and the temperature range for the next four days. If the weather icons aren’t showing or you want to change your location, click on the Settings link at the top of the page. On the General tab, scroll down to the location box and weather-display settings to make the adjustments.

headline.main: Tip of the Week: Adding Weather Icons to Google Calendar
